Australia sweats through heatwave, bushfire risk rated 'extreme'Large swaths of Australia on Sunday sweltered through a heatwave as authorities warned of elevated bushfire risk in an already high-risk fire season during an El Nino weather pattern. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 01:28:34 GMT JBUSJC4WIROHZOBNSMR4EUBDCY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-sweats-through-heatwave-bushfire-risk-lated-extreme-2024-02-04/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
Australia PM says government 'examining' claims against UN Palestinian agencyAustralia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Sunday his government was probing claims that some staff of the U.N. Palestinian refugee agency (UNRWA) were involved in the Oct. 7 Hamas attacks on Israel, after Australia paused funding to the aid agency last month. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 00:53:42 GMT LIG6HDUWWJPYFLX2UJQOTJQIV4 https://www.reuters.com/world/australia-pm-says-government-examining-claims-against-un-palestinian-agency-2024-02-04/Reuters世界
Cosmonaut to set record Sunday for most time spent in space, Russian news agencies reportRussian cosmonaut Oleg Kononenko is expected to set a world record on Sunday for the duration of space flights with nearly 2-1/2 years in total, Russian news agencies reported. Sun, 04 Feb 2024 00:07:19 GMT YT5AAQXPI5L53C6NAUT4LQTSKY https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/Russian-cosmonaut-set-record-sunday-most-time-spent-space-reports-2024-02-04/Reuters技术空间
Australia PM to introduce bill to reshape tax cuts on TuesdayAustralia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said on Sunday his government would legislate changes this week to planned tax cuts set to reduce benefits to the wealthy while giving low-income earners more breaks, as Australians endure higher living costs. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 23:38:57 GMT WAXOACI4RZP3BJHSSNY2IIUW3I https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australia-pm-introduce-bill-reshape-tax-cuts-tuesday-2024-02-03/Reuters世界亚太地区
Death toll from Chile's forest fires rises to 46, president saysAt least 46 people have died from forest fires raging in central Chile, President Gabriel Boric said on Saturday, warning that the death toll is likely to rise. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 22:42:57 GMT P6QB7OOHLZORHENEKVOTBSXEQY https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/death-toll-chiles-forest-fires-rises-46-president-says-2024-02-03/Reuters可持续发展气候与能源
US, Britain wage strikes against Iran-linked Houthis in YemenThe strikes hit buried weapons storage facilities, missile systems, launchers and other capabilities the Houthis have used to attack Red Sea shipping, the Pentagon said. It was the latest sign of spreading conflict in the Middle East. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 21:36:41 GMT XQCLK7TKQRP4RGPJ565CY4IR4A https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-carrying-out-new-strikes-yemen-us-officials-say-2024-02-03/Phil Stewart, Idrees Ali世界中东
US conducts strikes in self-defense against six Houthi anti-ship cruise missilesThe U.S. Central Command said on Saturday that U.S. forces conducted strikes in self-defense against six Houthi anti-ship cruise missiles prepared to launch against ships in the Red Sea. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 20:27:05 GMT 24WZH3FODBLDRP2SEJLTPONXLA https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/us-conducts-strikes-self-defense-against-six-houthi-anti-ship-cruise-missiles-2024-02-03/Reuters世界中东
US House panel recommends $17.6 billion in military aid for IsraelLegislation providing $17.6 billion in new military assistance to Israel as it wages war against Hamas was unveiled on Saturday in the U.S. House of Representatives. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 20:07:35 GMT ZLRR6D6SIRONJG5N7D5LOC6U3I https://www.reuters.com/world/us-house-panel-recommends-176-billion-military-aid-israel-2024-02-03/Richard Cowan世界
Israel says it has struck more than 50 Hezbollah targets in Syria since Oct 7The Israeli military said on Saturday that since the outbreak of the Gaza war on Oct. 7 it had struck more than 50 targets in Syria linked to the Iranian-backed Lebanese movement Hezbollah. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 19:20:27 GMT 7S7CWUNCXBPUPIZ5ZWRKHESQFU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israel-says-it-has-struck-more-than-50-hezbollah-targets-syria-since-oct-7-2024-02-03/Reuters世界中东
Suspected militants kill four Nigerian police officersAt least four police officers were killed in Nigeria's northeast Borno state after a gun battle with suspected Islamist insurgents, a police spokesperson said on Saturday. Sat, 03 Feb 2024 17:44:57 GMT ZXYTTZK2CBPDZILLCV6D3EJW7A https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/suspected-militants-kill-four-nigerian-police-officers-2024-02-03/Reuters世界非洲
Pope condemns anti-Judaism, anti-Semitism amid new wave of attacks against JewsPope Francis condemned all forms of anti-Judaism and anti-Semitism, labelling them as a "sin against God", after noticing an increase in attacks against Jews around the world.
